mapper.select: SELECT LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO, LBRTY_BBSCTT_SJ, LBRTY_BBSCTT_CN, LBRTY_BBSCTT_WR_DT, LBRTY_BBSCTT_RDCNT, SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO, USER_ID FROM LBRTY_BBSCTT WHERE 1=1 AND LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO = ${lbrtyBbscttNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO lbrty_bbsctt ( lbrty_bbsctt_no, lbrty_bbsctt_sj, lbrty_bbsctt_cn, lbrty_bbsctt_wr_dt,
sprvise_atchmnfl_no,

#{userId} )

INSERT INTO SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL ( SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_COURS, ATCHMNFL_NM, STORE_ATCHMNFL_NM, ATCHMNFL_TY, USER_ID ) VALUES ( SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{atchmnflNo}, #{atchmnflCours}, #{atchmnflNm}, #{storeAtchmnflNm}, #{atchmnflTy}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: select LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_NO, LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO, LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_CN, LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_WR_DT, PT_LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_NO, PT_LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO, USER_ID, USER_NCNM from V_LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER WHERE LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO = ${lbrtyBbscttNo} AND PT_LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO IS NULL AND PT_LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_NO IS NULL order by LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_WR_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE lbrty_bbsctt_answer SET LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_CN = #{lbrtyBbscttAnswerCn}, LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_WR_DT = sysdate WHERE lbrty_bbsctt_answer_no = ${lbrtyBbscttAnswerNo}
mapper.select: select LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_NO, LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO, LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_CN, LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_WR_DT, PT_LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_NO, PT_LBRTY_BBSCTT_NO, USER_ID, USER_NCNM from V_LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER where PT_LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_NO = #{ptLbrtyBbscttAnswerNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lbrty_bbsctt_answer ( lbrty_bbsctt_answer_no, lbrty_bbsctt_no, lbrty_bbsctt_answer_cn, lbrty_bbsctt_answer_wr_dt, pt_lbrty_bbsctt_answer_no, user_id, pt_lbrty_bbsctt_no ) VALUES ( LBRTY_BBSCTT_ANSWER_NO_SEQ.nextval, ${lbrtyBbscttNo}, #{lbrtyBbscttAnswerCn}, sysdate, ${ptLbrtyBbscttAnswerNo}, #{userId}, ${ptLbrtyBbscttNo} )
mapper.select: select SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_COURS, ATCHMNFL_NM, STORE_ATCHMNFL_NM, ATCHMNFL_TY, REGIST_DT, USER_ID, UPDT_DT from SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL where sprvise_atchmnfl_no = ${sprviseAtchmnflNo}
mapper.insert:

INSERT INTO SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL ( SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_COURS, ATCHMNFL_NM, STORE_ATCHMNFL_NM, ATCHMNFL_TY, USER_ID, UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( ${sprviseAtchmnflNo}, #{atchmnflNo}, #{atchmnflCours}, #{atchmnflNm}, #{storeAtchmnflNm}, #{atchmnflTy}, #{userId}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_NO, ATCHMNFL_COURS, ATCHMNFL_NM, STORE_ATCHMNFL_NM, ATCHMNFL_TY, REGIST_DT, USER_ID, UPDT_DT from SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL where SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO = ${sprviseAtchmnflNo}
